sentences.en: Supplant it with a constructive thought.
sentences.cn: 用一个积极的想法换掉它吧。

sentences.en: CAM is almost certainly here to stay and supplant its predecessors.
sentences.cn: 这里可以断言的是，CAM肯定会替代其前辈。

sentences.en: How could a tiny Internet retailer possibly supplant a national bookstore giant.
sentences.cn: 一个名不见经传的小小互联网零售商，怎么可能取代全美最大的连锁书店呢？
